_json.gridTitle: Dynamic Accumulators: Proven Method or Promising Idea?
_json.description: Because some plants tend to be very high in certain minerals, and because many of those plants have a deep root system, it is thought that these plants mine minerals from deep in the soil, accumulate them in their leaves, and fertilize the soil when their leaves drop and decompose. Such a plant is considered to be a dynamic accumulator.My layman's opinion concerning dynamic accumulation is that it is an idea that makes a lot of sense and an idea that I hope will be studied so that we can ha...
